statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM CustomerOrders
SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT total_amount, status FROM CustomerOrders ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT customer_id, total_amount, status FROM CustomerOrders WHERE status = 'Pending'
SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders WHERE order_id = 100;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM CustomerOrders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM CustomerOrders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 5000;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM CustomerOrders WHERE status = 'Delivered' GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY order_count DESC;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(total_amount) AS largest_order FROM CustomerOrders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING largest_order > 2000;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM Customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id GROUP BY Customers.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name FROM Customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM Customers INNER JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC, order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, shipment_date, tracking_number FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id INNER JOIN shipments ON orders.order_id = shipments.order_id;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date, shipment_status FROM shipments ORDER BY shipment_date DESC;
SELECT order_total, order_date FROM customer_orders WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT shipment_id, MAX(shipment_date) AS latest_shipment FROM shipments GROUP BY shipment_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_orders WHERE order_total > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, order_date, order_total FROM customers JOIN customer_orders ON customers.customer_id = customer_orders.customer_id;
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date, shipment_status FROM shipments WHERE shipment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY shipment_id ASC;

SELECT customers.customer_name AS customer, shipment_details.quantity, products.product_name FROM customers JOIN customer_orders ON customers.customer_id = customer_orders.customer_id JOIN shipments ON customer_orders.order_id = shipments.order_id JOIN shipment_details ON shipments.shipment_id = shipment_details.shipment_id JOIN products ON shipment_details.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM customer_orders GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity, total_price FROM order_items JOIN products ON order_items.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 'abc123';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, SUM(total_price) AS total_order_price FROM order_items GROUP BY order_id HAVING total_order_price > 500 ORDER BY total_order_price DESC;
SELECT shipment_date, delivery_address FROM shipments WHERE shipment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND delivery_address LIKE '%Street%';
